description: Schema for configuring a research paper.

anonymous.description: Removes author names and affiliations for anonymous submissions.

camera-ready.description: Disables line numbers, sets pdf-a mode, etc.

libraries.description: List of libraries used in the paper, these are files that will be included in the preamble of the document.

knowledges.description: List of knowledge files to use in the paper.

appendix.description: List of appendices included in the paper.

oneOf.description: Path to the bibliography file in bibtex/biblatex format.
List of bibliography files in bibtex/biblatex format.
